section.p:
The Agora SDK allows recording during a call. The Agora SDK allows recording during a call. After successfully calling this method, you can record the audio of all the users in the channel and get an audio recording file. After successfully calling this method, you can record the audio of all the users in the channel and get an audio recording file. .wav: Large file size with high fidelity. .wav: Large file size with high fidelity.
.aac: Small file size with low fidelity. .aac: Small file size with low fidelity.
